            Tobi Burns
          
          
            
              I am a classically trained data scientist living in the Abuja, Nigeria. Currently I work on the Institute of Human Virology team in Nigeria. I love talking about baseball, true crime podcasts, and causal inference.

articles.title: Blog
articles.contents:
I am a young Data Scientist from Nigeria. I am working on building a community of healthcare professionals who use data science to improve public health programs.
My plans this year include to develop two R packages for public health, and create a website for healthcare professionals to learn R.

articles.title: stephen-distill
articles.description: Welcome to the website. I hope you enjoy it!
